issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Update MR App to use immutable ApplicationID after YARN-716

comments.body:
Reviewing the patch at YARN-716 that also has the MR changes.

Will review and commit this and YARN-716 together.
MR part of the YARN-716 patch.
Reviewed and committed this to trunk and branch-2 together with YARN-716. Thanks Sid!

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3813 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3813/])
    YARN-716. Making ApplicationID immutable. Contributed by Siddharth Seth.
MAPREDUCE-5282. Updating MR App to use immutable ApplicationID after YARN-716. Contributed by Siddharth Seth. (Revision 1487994)

     Result = SUCCESS
